Class CardUpdateMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.message.Message
      • it.polimi.ingsw.ps42.message.CardUpdateMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GenericMessage, Visitable, java.io.Serializable

    public class CardUpdateMessage
extends Message
    Message used to notify the movement of a Card (A player taked a card from a tower)
    Author:
    Luca Napoletano, Claudio Montanari
